name: UpdateDeployedDevicesFleet
description: Update the friendly name property of a specific Fleet in your account.

Sid.description: Provides a 34 character string that uniquely identifies the requested Fleet resource.

DefaultDeploymentSid.description: Provides a string identifier of a Deployment that is going to be used as a default one for this Fleet.

FriendlyName.description: Provides a human readable descriptive text for this Fleet, up to 256 characters long.

$ul: **account_sid**: Speicifies the unique string identifier of the Account responsible for this Fleet.
**date_created**: Specifies the date this Fleet was created, given in UTC ISO 8601 format.
**date_updated**: Specifies the date this Fleet was last updated, given in UTC ISO 8601 format.
**default_deployment_sid**: Contains the string identifier of the automatically provisioned default Deployment of this Fleet.
**friendly_name**: Contains a human readable descriptive text for this Fleet, up to 256 characters long.
**links**: Contains a dictionary of URL links to nested resources of this Fleet.
**sid**: Contains a 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Fleet resource.
**unique_name**: Contains a unique and addressable name of this Fleet, e.g. 'default', up to 128 characters long.
**url**: Contains an absolute URL for this Fleet resource.
